charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(9) POSSESSION OF A FIREARM BY A PERSON WHO HAS BEEN CONVICTED BY A MISDEMEANOR CRIME OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE(2s)

charges.charge_disposition: S/A $100.00. All fines wv. B/P to be impris for a term of 2 months time served. Supv Rel 3 years under T/C of USPO and GO 318.
